column10: Risk Status Score

column18: Annexure A

column9: Risk Event (There is a risk that)
column10: Risk Effect (Which may occur)
column17: Mitigation
column18: Prevention

column9: DDA compliance issues post construction
column10: Post construction rectification works
column17: Complete ongoing inspections with DDA consultant
column18: DDA consultant to be engaged for staged inspections

column9: Shortage of skilled and unskilled subcontractors to complete the works
column10: Increase in costs, and project and delivery timeframe impacted, delaying project handover
column17: Ensure Contractor gain commitment from all subcontractors during the procurement and contract execution phase on the number of personnel each subcontractor is required to have on-site throughout the various stages of the project.
column18: Builder to provide and maintain a trade letting schedule and monitor monthly.

column9: Incidents occurs on footpath/road
column10: Undermine project completion
column17: Review Traffic Management, Site Management & Staging plans to identify all potential areas of interface and public exposure.
column18: Builder and Developer to engage in community consultation prior to the commencement of works

column8: Cost overrun between now and commencement onsite
column9: Construction budget increase between execution of contract and commencement onsite
column10: Increase to construction budget
column17: Ensure fixed price contract is executed with builder subject to CP's in favour of the developer to avoid cost increases.
column18: Builder to lock in trades and supply contracts immediately after contract execution.

column9: Accidental discharge from the site into the street i.e. construction waste, contaminated water or products, fuel etc.
column10: Impact site activities, potentially undermine project and delivery timeframes
column17: Ensure Contractor have a plan in place to avoid the discharge and contamination of the surrounding environment. Ensure Contractor is well versed in the event of an unexpected discharge and are ready to implement the necessary actions to remedy the contamination.
column18: Site Management Plan and pre-start meetings daily

column9: Unavailability of specialist trade due to heated market, competing projects for the available resources or interstate
column10: Project and delivery timeframes impacted, delaying project completion
column17: Ensure Contractor idenfity and develop a list of specialised contractors to initiate early EOI and engagement with.
column18: Book in all specialised trades early

column9: Failure of ground floor retaining walls
column10: Project and delivery timeframes impacted, delaying project completion and increase in project costs
column17: Ensure the contractor has a 3rd party RPEQ review of the design and installation.
column18: Engage reputable subcontractor

column18: Book in FEB meeting with QFES

column9: Insufficient site access, traffic, and pedestrian management delays programme
column10: Impact the cost and delivery timeframe of a project

column9: Delays to registration of easements
column10: Delay in delivery

column18: Commence the easement registration process

column8: Construction contingency and the cost to complete

column10: Cost increase to project budget

column9: Adverse / Latent site conditions

column8: Construction contract and Builder side deed

column9: Delay in Council assets going Off Maintenance
column10: On-going maintenance costs post DLP period

column18: Include activity in project programme

column18: Addition geotechnical testing

column9: Loss of visibility on site progress and construction costs due to builder and developer being at arm's length, resulting  in below par contract administration

column9: Delay issue of Civil OPW, resulting in delay of bulk earthworks

column9: Delay in Council assets going On Maintenance
column10: Project and delivery timeframe impacted, delaying project handover.

column18: Include activity in project programme

column9: May have cost increases to construction cost

column8: Disputes under contract with Head Contractor
column9: Contractor stops works

column9: Delay to site activities due to industrial action
